summary: Mod to change or correction appearance npc...
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/5025/updateappearancenpc.png[/img][/center]

Mod to change or correct appearance NPC.
If you like my mod do not forget to support it!
Can upload an image of my NPC your mods on face!

[img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/930/descriptione.png[/img]
My mod is designed to improve the appearance of almost all the men except for the NPC and other fighting NPC.
Modification corrects burr mouths npc, large noses in women and changes in the standard hairstyle hairstyles of famous authors!
While I have not adjusted the male NPC! but made ??a couple of public discussion, if you like I will correct them, too.

[img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/5453/installatione.png[/img]
Installation is easy!
Just install a NMM, or you can manually ..
Manually copy the folder date to your folder Skyrim and Confirm your replacement if you have to!

Additionally, if you do not have or do not want the NPC of Davnguard remove Update appearance npc-Dawnguard from your mod manager!

[color=red]Required Fashion!![/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] require and ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19623]Cazy hairs and demoness hairs conversion [/url]and an extra pack of hair!

Without these mods all NPCs will walk either bald or with standard hairstyles!

[color=green]compatibility[/color]
My mod should be compatible with other mods to change the appearance of the NPC, but I have not tested it with other mods so I can 

not say one hundred percent guarantee!

[img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/89/notesx.png[/img]
Your faces NPC may differ from mine! from the use of different beam facegen so remove them for better effect.

[color=green][b]What makes this mod[/b][/color]
Changes the appearance of almost all conventional NPC (except bandits or guards!)
Changes the appearance of quest NPC for example, Astrid
Corrects burr mouths
Removes large noses in female NPC
mod does not affect older NPC
almost all of was the original hair color
There is a correction of the NPC Dawnguard

[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/6/plannedupdate.png[/img]
Make correction combat NPC
if there is to be done and the male NPC
make full compatibility with other mods to change npc
and so on ...

Mods used in the screenshots
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273]Calientes Vanilla Outfits for CBBE [/url]:Clothing replacer
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654]Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set [/url] :Another armor replacer
face mode: I use the zzjay [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20172]Epic of Elwes [/url] namely only the Face mod only it with 

the eyebrows of coverwomen.You can use what you want to face mod for my mod!

[color=green]updates[/color]
Change in 0.82
Updated appearance of some NPC.
Change in 0.83
Added dirt on NPC who it should be.
Added the war paint for the NPC who it is.
Updated looks at some NPC or altered completely.
Change in 0.84
updated face
made the last change in the appearance of certain NPC
details in the screenshot (not all examples!)
until more nebudu update looks normal NPC?\'ll move to battle factions.
Change in 0.84.1
Updated the exterior of some NPCs.
Change in 0.85
updated face
Added new faces to the soldiers the Stormcloaks.
Added new faces for Vigilants of Stendarr.

[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/5474/thanksme.png[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283148]apachii[/url] wonderful package for hair
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2689072]zzjay[/url]  great package for hair and beautiful face of mode
